products.title: hoodies
products.description: Premium Double Layered hoodie, extra padded and reversible. This is the thickest piece from our curated selection, made out of the highest quality cotton sustainably developed for a buttery hand feel. Manufactured in Spain

products.title: zip-ups
products.description: Premium cut and sew hoodie with own developed pattern featuring a boxy fit, dropped shoulders and added chest measurements for oversized drape under the arms. Densely knitted brushed French terry with uniform and slanted loopbacks lightly brushed for a buttery hand feel. Highest quality Organic cotton. Manufactured in Spain

products.title: longsleeves
products.description: Highest quality cut and sew longsleeve T-Shirt with own developed pattern featuring dropped shoulders with wide chest and cropped length to achieve a fashion forward look t-shirt with an oversized fit that doesn’t feel baggy but boxy. Premium double stitched cuffs on the sleeves. Our most premium fabric offering, milled with finely knitted heavyweight combed organic cotton. Manufactured in Spain
